index.html.../images/index-1.jpg: Send the /special_link command, then click Create to generate a new special link.
index.html.../images/index-2.jpg: Send the message you want to store to the bot.
index.html.../images/index-3.jpg: If you want to store more messages, send each message to the bot one by one.
index.html.../images/index-4.jpg: Once you’re done adding messages, click Generate Link to create a shareable link.
index.html.../images/index-5.jpg: Once you click Generate Link, the bot will provide a shareable link that you can also modify later.

modify.html.../images/modify-1.jpg:
First method:

You can directly modify the link by clicking Modify Link in the message sent by the bot after the link is created..
modify.html.../images/modify-2.jpg:
Second method:

1) Send the /special_link command, then click Modify to edit an existing link.
modify.html.../images/modify-4.png:
Second method:

2) send the link you want modify sent to bot or click the link you want to edit
modify.html.../images/modify-4.jpg: You can now customize the link using the available options.
modify.html.../images/modify-5.jpg:
Easy Tip:

Just send the link you want to edit to the bot, then press Modify Link.

edit_content.html.../images/edit_content-2.jpg: Using the buttons below, you can add or remove messages for this link.

edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-2.jpg: Choose whether to add the message at the first position, in between existing messages, or at the last position.
edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-3.jpg: Here, we choose the In Between option to add the message between existing messages.
edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-4.png: Then send position number to which position you want to add new message in the like, here we choosed 2 to add in second postion
edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-5.jpg: Then send the messaage you want to store to bot
edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-6.jpg: To add more messages, send them one by one. When you’re finished, click Done.
edit_content_add.html.../images/edit_content_add-7.jpg: The message has been added successfully.

edit_content_remove.html.../images/edit_content_remove-2.jpg: Enter the position number of the message to remove. In this example, we selected 3 to delete the third message.
edit_content_remove.html.../images/edit_content_remove-3.jpg: The selected message (position 3) has been deleted successfully.
edit_content_remove.html.../images/edit_content_remove-4.jpg: To delete more than one message, enter each message position separated by a comma (for example: 1, 3, 4, 5).

add_whitelisters.html.../images/add_whitelisters-5.jpg:
Two Methods to Retrieve a User ID:

1) Forward the user’s message to Rose bot and reply with /id.

2)Send the /id command along with the username (for example: /id @username).
add_whitelisters.html.../images/add_whitelisters-6.jpg: Then send the user ID obtained from Rose bot, and you’re done.

remove_whitelisters.html.../images/remove_whitelisters-2.jpg: Then send the user ID of the whitelister you want to remove. Once done, the whitelister will be removed successfully.

protect_content.html.../images/protect_content-1.jpg: To Enable Protect content click the enable button.
protect_content.html.../images/protect_content-2.jpg: Protect Content has now been enabled for the link.
protect_content.html.../images/protect_content-3.jpg: After enabling Protect Content, the Enable button changes to Disable, Click Disable to turn off Protect Content.
protect_content.html.../images/protect_content-4.jpg: Protect Content has now been disabled for the link.

set_expire.html.../images/set_expire-3.jpg:
Then send the validity period after which the link should expire.

For more information about validity periods, click here .
set_expire.html.../images/set_expire-4.jpg: Auto expiration has been set successfully.

remove_expire.html.../images/remove_expire-3.jpg: Auto expiration has been successfully removed.
